name: Elf Pairs
description:
Elf Pairs is a great Christmas Game for Kids

The object of the game is to match the Elf's and when you do Papa Elf says a series of well done messages

Plus we have also added a bonus Elf Photo Gallery were you can make the Elf's your wallpaper or background.

Voiced by the Famous VoiceoverGuy.co.uk

Produced by VoiceoverGuy.co.uk & SlinkyApps.com

Works on al devices 4.0 and above,
